properties.Name: MedicalCondition
properties.Description: A disease, illness or injury; any physiologic, mental or psychological condition or disorder. This includes pregnancy and complications of pregnancy.

Columns.Name: MedicalConditionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a medical condition.

Columns.Name: MedicalConditionName
Columns.Description: The name of a medical condition.

Columns.Name: MedicalConditionDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a medical condition.

Columns.Name: IcdVersionNumber
Columns.Description: The version number of the ICD Code.

Columns.Name: IcdDiseaseCode
Columns.Description: The code identifying an ICD-defined disease.

Columns.Name: DiagnosisRelatedGroupVersionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Diagnosis-Related Group Version.

Columns.Name: DiagnosisRelatedGroupCode
Columns.Description: The code identifying a Diagnosis-Related Group.

Columns.Name: MajorDiagnosticCategoryId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Major Diagnostic Category.

Columns.Name: SnomedCtConceptId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a SNOMED CT Concept.

Columns.Name: MedicalConditionTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a medical condition type.

Columns.Name: AffectedOrganStatement
Columns.Description: A statement regarding the affected organ(s).
